name: ApocoMail
description:
Welcome to the nameless post-apocalyptic wonderland where you play as the wondering mailman on a mission to deliver everybody's stuff! This game was made as a part of Rensselaer Polytechic Institute's Level Upstate program  in about 4 days total. 

Credits: 

Rachel Mailhot - Producer/Writer

Jenny Bourke - Artist/Programmer

Leonardo Price -  Artist

Zaire Wilson - Programmer

Yizhe Wu - Artist
